title: BRIEF-Persta Resources Says In 2019, Strong Winter Pricing Was Offset By Weak Summer Pricing
text:
BRIEF-Persta Resources Says In 2019, Strong Winter Pricing Was Offset By Weak Summer Pricing

Stock Markets 41 minutes ago (Sep 15, 2019 21:40)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Persta Resources Says In 2019, Strong Winter Pricing Was Offset By Weak Summer Pricing Sept 16 (Reuters) - Persta Resources Inc : * IN 2019, STRONG WINTER PRICING WAS OFFSET BY WEAK SUMMER PRICING, BASED ON CURRENT FORECASTS SPOT PRICE EXPECTED TO AVERAGE C$1.58/GJ * IN RESPONSE, NEW WELL DRILLING AND DEVELOPMENT IN WESTERN CANADA WAS CURTAILED OVER PAST 18-MTHS, & GAS MARKET STARTING TO REBALANCE

BRIEF-Persta Resources Says In 2019, Strong Winter Pricing Was Offset By Weak Summer Pricing
